name: Post Poly - Customizable 3D Models
description:
Free & premium customizable production-ready 3D models for every design project. Customize, angle, and snapshot 3D illustrations in seconds.


Got feedback? Tell me at support@postpoly.com! 

Do you have 3D model packs that you want to sell through Post Poly? Contact me at jordy@postpoly.com to make a passive income!


Post Poly - 3D customizable models plugin is created by Post Poly. One place for all your 3D web design models and one tool to customize them all. Check it out at www.postpoly.com and app.postpoly.com
